code: import React from'react';import{services,translations}from'../data/mock';import{Store,Building2,Code2,Settings}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const iconMap={Store:Store,Building2:Building2,Code2:Code2,Settings:Settings};const Services=_ref=>{let{lang}=_ref;const t=translations[lang];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"services",className:"py-20 px-6 bg-gray-900",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-white mb-4",children:t.services.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-gray-400",children:t.services.subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8",children:services.map(service=>{const IconComponent=iconMap[service.icon]||Code2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"group bg-gray-800 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-gray-700 hover:border-green-500/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-green-500/10 hover:-translate-y-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-green-500/20 to-blue-500/20 rounded-2xl flex items-center justify-center mb-6 group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconComponent,{className:"w-8 h-8 text-green-400"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-4",children:service.title[lang]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300 leading-relaxed",children:service.description[lang]})]},service.id);})})]})});};export default Services;
